uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.forms

Class Field<I>

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.forms.Field<I>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - Type of field value

    public final class Field<I>
extends java.lang.Object
    Field represents a single field in the form consisting of a label and and Input.
    Author:
    spb

      • addValidator

        public void addValidator(FieldValidator<I> v)
        Set an external validator for the field that augments the validation performed by the input. In most cases it is preferable to extend the Input to perform additional validation. However this can be useful for avoiding code duplication as a FieldValidator is added by composition and is preferable to a FormValidator if the validation only involves a single field because the errors will be associated wih that field.
        Parameters:
        v - FieldValidator to set

      • removeValidator

        public void removeValidator(FieldValidator<I> v)
